name: evaluateJavaScript(_:in:in:completionHandler:)
desc: Evaluates a JavaScript string in the context of the specified frame and content world.
declaration: @MainActor func evaluateJavaScript(_ javaScript: String, in frame: WKFrameInfo? = nil, in contentWorld: WKContentWorld, completionHandler: ((Result<Any, Error>) -> Void)? = nil)
